item.title: Remove please
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:9, topic:381235”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=477049.msg3489906#msg3489906 date=1296868726]

It looks like the shoulder pieces are being held together by screws, or shirt buttons.
Also, This isn’t really a custom NPC, it’s more like a fitted armor set.

They are more like medals holding the cape and the shoulders together, O.o im guessing you’ve never seen it before?

Not once have I seen it. Also, if you plan on actually adding that cape, you’re going to want to segment it so it’ll animate and not act like a sheet of metal or cardboard.

I know. -.-
[/quote]
Obviously you didn’t or you would have done that already. And why are you getting angry at me for giving helpful suggestions?[/quote]
I havn’t done it yet because i wasn’t going to add it, i never add my models to my server. And im not getting angry, I was simply sighing.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove please

It looks like the shoulder pieces are being held together by screws, or shirt buttons.
Also, This isn’t really a custom NPC, it’s more like a fitted armor set.

They are more like medals holding the cape and the shoulders together, O.o im guessing you’ve never seen it before?

Not once have I seen it. Also, if you plan on actually adding that cape, you’re going to want to segment it so it’ll animate and not act like a sheet of metal or cardboard.
[/quote]
I know. -.-[/quote]
Obviously you didn’t or you would have done that already. And why are you getting angry at me for giving helpful suggestions?
